name: imprecisely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not accurate or exact: The term is often used very imprecisely. The frontiers of Persia have always been somewhat imprecisely defined.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is useful to define these terms, which are often used imprecisely and interchangeably.His lawyers have complained that the charge was written so imprecisely that in places it is unclear what he is accused of.Many of the laws in this area are imprecisely worded and in need of updating.
